text: The Prisoner of Zenda is a 1913 American silent adventure movie directed by Hugh Ford and Edwin S. Porter. It was based on the 1894 novel of the same name by Anthony Hope and starring James K. Hackett, Beatrice Beckley, David Torrence, Frank Shannon, Minna Gale. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * The Prisoner of Zenda (1913) at Silent Era * * Category:1913 movies Category:1910s adventure movies Category:1910s romance movies Category:American silent movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Hugh Ford Category:Movies directed by Edwin S. Porter Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 19th century Category:Movies set in Europe
title: The Prisoner of Zenda (1913 movie)
